name: Black Point Trailhead
description:
Black Point Trailhead

A "walking-simulator" trail experience inspired by one of my favorite spots. Find your way through the woods to reveal an ocean view and a bit more.

Designed as a practice exercise to learn Unreal Engine level building (lighting, texturing, landscape sculpting, actor placement/management, blueprints, UX/UI, sounds.)
 
Designed and Created by Dan Duffy

Unreal Engine 4
